name: property-access-result
description: Represents a BACnet property access result, detailing the outcome of accessing a property, including value or error.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object whose property was accessed.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The property identifier specifying the property accessed.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: Optional array index for the property.

fields.name: device-identifier
fields.description: Optional identifier of the device associated with the property.

fields.name: access-result

options.name: property-value
options.description: The value of the property accessed.

options.name: property-access-error
options.description: Error encountered while accessing the property.

fields.description: The result of accessing the property, either a value or an error.
